text:
And So It Begins! PC-Nick Jonas Arrive In Jodhpur To Kick-Start Their Destination Wedding
And So It Begins! PC-Nick Jonas Arrive In Jodhpur To Kick-Start Their Destination Wedding
Begin the *drum rolls* as Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have left the Bay to finally begin their happily ever after. The love-birds are all set to tie the knot in Jodhpur and the celebrations have just kick-started for the families.
After a Puja at Dr. Madhu Chopra's place last afternoon, the couple along with their families flew down to Jodhpur in the wee hours of the morning.
PC and Nick were accompanied by mother, Madhu Chopra, cousin Parineeti Chopra, and other relatives. Also seen were Nick’s brother Joe Jonas and Joe’s fiancé and Games of Thrones star Sophie Turner.
(Also read: Sansa Stark Goes 'Desi', Dons An Exquisite Salwar-Suit For PC - Nick Jonas' Wedding Puja)

A DNA report claims that Jodhpur celebrations will begin with mehendi and sangeet ceremony on November 29 at the Umaid Bhawan Palace.
title: And So It Begins! PC-Nick Jonas Arrive In Jodhpur To Kick-Start Their Destination Wedding
description: Begin the *drum rolls* as Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have left the Bay to finally begin their sweet forever. The love-birds are all set to tie the knot in Jodhpur and the celebrations have just kick-started for the families.After a Puja at Dr. Madhu Chopra's place last afternoon, the couple along with their families flew down to Jodhpur in the wee hours of the morning.
